channel.title: New character mouth error
channel.description: ok, When you make a new account you have no beard And its like a hole..., when you do ::Char and change it its ok but it dont save :S does anyone know how i can make it so when you make a new account u have a beard and so that when you do ::char it saves

item.title: New character mouth error
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change the pBeard integer in the player class.

Read full topic
